summary: BitsetArray implements a pandas‑compatible ExtensionArray that stores each element as a fixed‑width byte string encoding a set of bits. It presents each element as a Python set and supports set arithmetic (union, intersection, difference, subset/superset checks) on individual items, slices, or boolean masks, handling conversion between the compact binary representation and set objects while managing dtype casting and copying.
business_intent: Provide a memory‑efficient, pandas‑friendly container for large collections of bitsets, enabling users to manipulate them with familiar set semantics while keeping storage overhead low.
